WorkItem.ClosedComment: 4.1.05 Released. If this is still an issue, please reopen with exact steps to reproduce and any necessary character files
WorkItem.Description:

Comments.Message: Not a duplicate, but already identified and fixed for next version
Exactly the same here. I'm puzzled because the same version worked for a couple of days.
It may be related to that issue http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/20610 since I think I got this after I had got that.
[As I mentioned in 20610 which appears related:] a temporary workaround is to use the web client for settings and the local client for optimization because the first saves (and the latter is faster).
